Text:
Gronpar - thanks for all your hard work on these excellent shows - much appreciated.
My friend DaveInCalgary from Demonoid (where we miss you) has some important info for you - and has no way to pm you.
If you get a chance can you give him a look see over there, thanks again.
Hope the leg is healing up fine.
FreeMorrison
FreeMorrison6789@yahoo.com
